games.name: Retro Bowl
games.description: Retro Bowl emulates the gameplay of American football and was heavily influenced by the Tecmo Bowl series.

games.name: Subway Surfers
games.description: Subway Surfers is an endless runner mobile game co-developed by Kiloo, a private company based in Denmark and SYBO Games.

games.name: Rooftop Snipers
games.description: Rooftop Snipers is a chaotic two-button two-player sniper game.

games.name: Run 3
games.description: Run 3 is the first Run game to introduce a storyline, mainly told through cutscenes.

games.name: Krunker.io
games.description: An easy to get into fully moddable First Person Shooter with advanced movement mechanics.

games.name: agar.io
games.description: Agar.io is a massively multiplayer online action game.
2048 is a single-player sliding block puzzle game designed by Italian web developer Gabriele Cirulli.

games.name: Cookie Clicker
games.description: Cookie Clicker is a free-to-play incremental clicker game developed by Orteil.

games.name: Combines.io
games.description: Combines.io is a crazy blend of action and farming where you drive a combine, harvest crops and destroy other players in heated online battles.

games.name: Fortnite
games.description: Fortnite is a co-op sandbox survival game developed by Epic Games and People Can Fly, with the former publishing it.

games.name: JKLM.fun
games.description: JKLM.fun is a fun and fast-paced multiplayer game where you have to press the right keys at the right time to win.

games.name: GeForce NOW
games.description: GeForce NOW is a cloud gaming service developed by Nvidia.

games.name: Papas Pizzeria
games.description: Papa's Pizzeria is the first game in the Papa Louie time-management restaurant series, and was officially released on August 7, 2007.

games.name: Bloons Tower Defense 2
games.description: Bloons TD Battles 2, also known as Battles 2 or BTDB2, is a competitive tower defense game developed and published by Ninja Kiwi.

games.name: Frogger
games.description: Frogger is either single-player or two players alternating. The frog starts at the bottom of the screen, which contains a horizontal road occupied by speeding cars, trucks, and bulldozers.

games.name: Crazy Taxi
games.description: Crazy Taxi is a series of racing video games that was developed by Hitmaker and published by Sega.

games.name: Duck Life 1
games.description: Duck Life is a game series where you train your duck for races and/or battles.

games.name: Duck Life 2
games.description: Duck Life is a game series where you train your duck for races and/or battles.

games.name: Duck Life 3 - Evolution
games.description: Duck Life is a game series where you train your duck for races and/or battles.

games.name: Duck Life 4
games.description: Duck Life is a game series where you train your duck for races and/or battles.

games.name: Wings.io
games.description: Wings.io is a Massive multiplayer online game. Control your plane and shoot down other players!

games.name: Bow Man
games.description: Bowman is an archery game where you and an opponent take shots at each other. You win when you've hit the opponent fatally.

games.name: Diep.io
games.description: Diep.io is a multiplayer action game where players control tanks and earn points by destroying shapes and killing other players in a 2D arena.

games.name: Super Mario 64
games.description: Super Mario 64 is a 1996 platform game for the Nintendo 64, developed by Nintendo EAD and published by Nintendo. The first Super Mario game to feature 3D gameplay!

games.name: Pokemon Stadium 2
games.description: Pokemon Stadium 2 is a strategy video game developed by Nintendo EAD and published by Nintendo for the Nintendo 64. It features all 251 Pokémon from the first and second generations of the franchise.

games.name: Slope
games.description: Slope, a new arcade game from Y8 games, engage you in a simple yet deadly challenge: roll down the slope for as long as possible without falling off the edge or hitting any obstacles along the way.

games.name: Slope 2
games.description: Slope 2, a new arcade game from Y8 games, engage you in a simple yet deadly challenge: roll down the slope for as long as possible without falling off the edge or hitting any obstacles along the way.

games.name: Tetris
games.description: Tetris, video game created by Russian designer Alexey Pajitnov in 1985 that allows players to rotate falling blocks strategically to clear levels.

games.name: Stack
games.description: The goal of the game is to stack the moving blocks over each other as high as you can.

games.name: 1v1.lol
games.description: Fight to survive in this epic multiplayer battle royale build battle where only the last player standing wins and achieves the long-awaited master victory.

games.name: Team Fortress 2
games.description: Team Fortress 2 is a 2007 multiplayer first-person shooter game developed and published by Valve Corporation.

games.name: BuildRoyale.io
games.description: Build Royale.io is a 2D shooter IO game where you must build and loot to upgrade your weapons to defeat all your enemies.

games.name: Sonic The Hedgehog (Original)
games.description: Race at lightning speeds across seven classic zones as Sonic the Hedgehog.

games.name: Battleboats.io
games.description: A real-time, real-fun multiplayer game. Play together in teams, upgrade your mighty battleship and destroy the enemy base.

games.name: SuperSnake.io
games.description: Your goal is become the biggest and longest snake in the world.If your head touches another player, you will explode and then it's game over. But if others run into YOU, then THEY will explode, and you can eat their remains!

games.name: Core Ball
games.description: Core Ball is a fun and addictive game where you have to control a ball and avoid the obstacles. The game is simple, but it's hard to master.

games.name: Friday Night Funkin: Vs Ex
games.description: Friday Night Funkin' Vs Ex is a mod of Friday Night Funkin' that adds a new character, Ex Boyfriend, and a new week, Ex Week.

games.name: Fireboy and Watergirl Forest Temple
games.description: Fireboy and Watergirl: Forest Temple is a fun and addictive game where you have to control two characters at the same time. The game is simple, but it's hard to master.

games.name: Drift Hunters
games.description: Drift Hunters is a fun and addictive game where you have to control a car and drift around the track. The game is simple, but it's hard to master.

games.name: A Dark Room
games.description: A Dark Room is a text-based adventure game where you have to survive in a dark room. The game is simple, but it's hard to master.

games.name: Basketball Stars
games.description: Basketball Stars is a fun and addictive game where you have to control a basketball player and score as many points as you can. The game is simple, but it's hard to master.

games.name: Basket Random
games.description: In Basket Random game, try to score a basket by using only one key with different variations from each other!

games.name: Bike Mania
games.description: Ride your bike through the bumpy and challenging tracks. Do not hit the ground and show your skill!

games.name: Breaklock
games.description: A hybrid of Mastermind and the Android pattern lock. A game you gonna love to hate.

games.name: The Chroma Incident
games.description: The Achromats have taken the worlds color offline! Raid their colorless lair and vanquish them all, restoring the world to it's technicolor glory.

games.name: Coloron
games.description: COLORON is a fun and well-designed platformer. The goal is to match the color of the tower to the bouncing ball. Keep it going for as long as you can, just don't get mad.

games.name: Cubefield
games.description: Cubefield is a simple but addictive game, there are only two controls – left and right. Use the arrow keys on your keyboard to guide your ship through an endless field of ominous looking coloured cubes – if you hit one, it’s game over.

games.name: Donut Boy
games.description: The Dough-Nutter 4000 has malfunctioned! It's up to you, Donut Boy, to rescue the employees and donuts that were scattered around town from the resulting explosion.

games.name: Doodle Jump
games.description: Let's travel with the cartoon character as high as possible!

games.name: Sonic 1
games.developer: RubberDuckyCooly, GrubbyPlaya, mattConn, VinMannie, Christian Whitehead, and SEGA
games.description: Sonic 1 is a platform video game developed by Sonic Team and published by Sega.

games.name: Sonic 2
games.developer: RubberDuckyCooly, GrubbyPlaya, mattConn, VinMannie, Christian Whitehead, and SEGA
games.description: Sonic 2 is a platform video game developed by Sonic Team and published by Sega.
